Input:

[[123456, 45],[123457, 46],[123458, 1000],[123459, 1129],[123460, 999],[123461, 47],[123462, 50],[123463, 67],[123464,35],[123465, 50],[123466, 10000],[123467, 5000],[123468,60]]

Output:

Cluster 1: 
	[123458, 1000]
	[123459, 1129]
	[123460, 999]
	[123466, 10000]
	[123467, 5000]

Cluster 2: 
	[123456, 45]
	[123457, 46]
	[123461, 47]
	[123462, 50]
	[123463, 67]
	[123464, 35]
	[123465, 50]
	[123468, 60]
====================================
        DDoS time intervals         
====================================
[[123458, 123460], [123466, 123467]]
